name: chrome-lighthouse-monitor
description: A cron job bot that retrieves lighthouse metrics for given sites.

scripts.dev: cp src/env/.env.develop.json src/env/.env.json && tsc && node build/CronServer.js
scripts.prod: cp src/env/.env.production.json src/env/.env.json && tsc && node build/CronServer.js
scripts.start: cp src/env/.env.production.json src/env/.env.json && tsc && node build/CronServer.js

author: Chris Frewin
